TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ConfigurationElementCollectionType extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the type of a ConfigurationElementCollectionType object.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This enumeration contains all the possible return values for the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection.CollectionType%2A> property. It is used by the configuration system during run time to correctly merge configuration settings. It is also used when creating a custom class that extends <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection>.
By default, the type of a <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection> object is AddRemoveClearMap. If a BasicMap is required, override the ConfigurationElementCollectionType property when extending <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection>.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollectionType AddRemoveClearMap = int32(1)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollectionType AddRemoveClearMapAlternate = int32(3)

Docs.summary: Same as AddRemoveClearMap, except that this type causes the T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection?qualifyHint=False

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollectionType BasicMap = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Collections of this type contain elements that apply to the level at which they are specified, and to all child levels. A child level cannot modify the properties specified by a parent element of this type.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollectionType BasicMapAlternate = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Same as BasicMap, except that this type causes the T:System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection?qualifyHint=False
